description:
In thisÂ course we quickly and easily go through, step by step the process of creating your very own 3D book Image. 3D images are essential to sell your products online.

They provide the customer with a visual representation of the product you are selling.

Helps turn your online product into something more tangible.

Once you complete this course you will have learnt to quickly and easily swap out your new book cover image for the new one, saving you money every time.

You will learn to 3D Model your own book to the dimensions you need. The course will show you how to add your own cover design to the model.

This process can be replicated and tranfered to the other products in your portfolio.

And the best thing about this course is we use the free and open source software Blender.

So join me and create a 3D Book design that is both appealing and visually engaging to your potential customers.
title: 3D Book Creation in Blender
